page.title: 06E.Allington Village Hall
page.content: East Allington village hall is situated in the centre of the village. It has a main hall with stage, a smaller room, known as "Johnny Walker Room", kitchen, shower room and toilets.It is managed by a committee made up of representatives from groups that hire the hall, also co-opted members from the community.The hall is the main, large, meeting room in the village.It is hired for most fund raising events, parties, discos, committee meetings, elections, and exhibitions.To hire the hall costs Â£1.20 per hour.The committee room costs Â£1.00 per hour and the use of the kitchen 50p per hour. Mother and Toddlers costs 20p per person.The heating has to be paid for separately according to the meter reading.
